cashregister

Interface ICashRegister

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CashRegister

    public interface ICashRegister
    Specifies the behavior of a cash register. It defines methods that allow to operate on a cash register and manage the products that are associated with it. Furthermore it provides the means to register specific User Interfaces that provide the output mechanism for cash registers.
    Author:
    OOP

    • Method Detail

      • getID

        long getID()
        Returns the id of the cash register
        Returns:
        the id of the cash register

      • addShoppingCart

        Long addShoppingCart()
        Adds a new IShoppingCart to the cash register.
        Returns:
        returns the id of the new IShoppingCart

      • getShoppingCarts

        Collection<IShoppingCart> getShoppingCarts()
        Returns the IShoppingCarts associated with the cash register.
        Returns:
        the IShoppingCarts associated with the cash register

      • addProductToShoppingCart

        boolean addProductToShoppingCart(long id,
                                 IShoppingCartElement element)
        Adds an element IShoppingCartElement to a specific IShoppingCart. The IShoppingCart is identified by an id. If the IShoppingCart can not be found or the IShoppingCartElement can not be added, then the method returns false.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the IShoppingCart
        element - the IShoppingCartElement that should be added to the IShoppingCart
        Returns:
        true if the element could be added to the IShoppingCart, false otherwise

      • registerCashRegisterUI

        void registerCashRegisterUI(ICashRegisterUI ui)
        Allows to register a User Interface via the ICashRegisterUI interface. This provides the means to use different implementations for the User Interface.
        Parameters:
        ui - the User Interface that should be registered with the CashRegister

      • unregisterCashRegisterUI

        void unregisterCashRegisterUI(ICashRegisterUI ui)
        Allows to unregister a User Interface via the ICashRegisterUI interface. If the passed User Interface is not registered nothing is done.
        Parameters:
        ui - user interface that should be unregistered

      • displayProducts

        void displayProducts()
        This method is used to display the Products, that are managed by the cash register, in an User Interface. A cash register can have several User Interfaces that are defined via the ICashRegisterUI interface and the information is displayed on each of them.

      • displayShoppingCarts

        void displayShoppingCarts()
        This method is used to display the IShoppingCarts, that are managed by the cash register, in an User Interface. A cash register can have several User Interfaces that are defined via the ICashRegisterUI interface and the information is displayed on each of them.

      • displayShoppingCart

        void displayShoppingCart(long id)
        This method is used to display a specific IShoppingCart, that is managed by the cash register, in an User Interface. The IShoppingCart is identified via its id. A cash register can have several User Interfaces that are defined via the ICashRegisterUI interface and the information is displayed on each of them.
        Parameters:
        id - the id that identifies the IShoppingCart

      • displayRecords

        void displayRecords()
        This method is used to display the Records, that are managed by the cash register, in an User Interface. A cash register can have several User Interfaces that are defined via the ICashRegisterUI interface and the information is displayed on each of them.

      • selectProduct

        IShoppingCartElement selectProduct(String product)
        Selects a IShoppingCartElement (represented by an IProduct) from the CashRegister and returns it. This selection process is used to retrieve products and further process them (for example to put them into the IShoppingCart).
        Parameters:
        product - The name of a product that should be selected
        Returns:
        the product if found, null otherwise

      • selectProduct

        IShoppingCartElement selectProduct(Product product)
        Selects an IShoppingCartElement (represented by an IProduct) from the CashRegister and returns it. This selection process is used to retrieve IShoppingCartElement and further process them (for example to put them into the IShoppingCart).
        Parameters:
        product - The product that should be selected
        Returns:
        the product if found, null otherwise

      • payShoppingCart

        IInvoice payShoppingCart(long id,
                         IPayment provider)
                  throws ShoppingCartNotFoundException
        Pays all IShoppingCartElements in a specific IShoppingCart. The IShoppingCart is identified via its id and the payment process is only initiated if the IShoppingCart is managed by the ICashRegister.

        The payment is made via the IPayment provider that is passed to this method. This PaymentProvider provides all methods necessary to complete the payment. Each payment returns a PaymentTransaction.

        The resulting PaymentTransaction is attached to an Invoice. The Invoice contains a list of IShoppingCartElements that have been paid in the PaymentTransaction. Only copies of the paid IShoppingCartElements are stored in the Invoice.

        The Invoice is stored in the implementing class and returned from the method.

        After the payment has been made, the IShoppingCartElements are cleared from the IShoppingCart.

        Parameters:
        id - the id of the IShoppingCart
        provider - the payment provider
        Returns:
        the IInvoice created or null.
        Throws:
        ShoppingCartNotFoundException - if no IShoppingCart can be found with the given id.
